```{r}
#| label: logregmedfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

medfunc_inner <- function(data, impdata, novars, medvar, medvaradj, nomeddiff, val = "Increase") {
  modvarstmp <- c(modvars, "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_mra1", "sos_lm_loop1")
  modvarstmp <- setdiff(modvarstmp, novars)
  modvarsmedtmp <- c(modvars, "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_mra1", "sos_lm_loop1", "bbldiff2", "rasiarnidiff2", "mradiff2", "loopdiff2")
  modvarsmedtmp <- setdiff(modvarsmedtmp, nomeddiff)
  modvarsmedtmp <- setdiff(modvarsmedtmp, novars)

  moduni <- summary(glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " == '", val, "' ~ crt")),
    family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = data
  ))

  modbi <- summary(glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " == '", val, "' ~ crt + ", paste(medvaradj, collapse = " + "))),
    family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = data
  ))

  modadj <- with(impdata, glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " == '", val, "' ~ crt + ", paste(modvarstmp, collapse = " + "))),
    family = binomial(link = "logit")
  ))
  modadj <- summary(pool(modadj))

  modadjmed <- with(impdata, glm(formula(paste0(medvar, " == '", val, "' ~ crt + ", paste(modvarsmedtmp, collapse = " + "))),
    family = binomial(link = "logit")
  ))
  modadjmed <- summary(pool(modadjmed))

  out <- tibble(
    Med = medvar,
    uni = paste0(
      fn(exp(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"]), 2), " (",
      fn(exp(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] - global_z05 * moduni$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"]), 2), "-",
      fn(exp(moduni$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] + global_z05 * moduni$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"]), 2), "), ",
      fn(moduni$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|z|)"], dig = 3, p = T)
    ),
    bi = paste0(
      fn(exp(modbi$coefficients[2, "Estimate"]), 2), " (",
      fn(exp(modbi$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] - global_z05 * modbi$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"]), 2), "-",
      fn(exp(modbi$coefficients[2, "Estimate"] + global_z05 * modbi$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"]), 2), "), ",
      fn(modbi$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|z|)"], dig = 3, p = T)
    ),
    mult = paste0(
      fn(exp(modadj$estimate[2]), 2), " (",
      fn(exp(modadj$estimate[2] - global_z05 * modadj$std.error[2]), 2), "-",
      fn(exp(modadj$estimate[2] + global_z05 * modadj$std.error[2]), 2), "), ",
      fn(modadj$p.value[2], dig = 3, p = T)
    ),
    multmed = paste0(
      fn(exp(modadjmed$estimate[2]), 2), " (",
      fn(exp(modadjmed$estimate[2] - global_z05 * modadjmed$std.error[2]), 2), "-",
      fn(exp(modadjmed$estimate[2] + global_z05 * modadjmed$std.error[2]), 2), "), ",
      fn(modadjmed$p.value[2], dig = 3, p = T)
    )
  )
  return(out)
}

medfunc <- function(data, impdata, novars = NULL, check = F) {
  rasiarni <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "rasiarnidiff2", medvaradj = "sos_lm_rasiarni1", nomeddiff = c("rasiarnidiff2"))
  rasiarni_exarni <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "rasiarnidiff2_exarni", medvaradj = "sos_lm_rasiarni1", nomeddiff = c("rasiarnidiff2"))
  mra <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "mradiff2", medvaradj = "sos_lm_mra1", nomeddiff = c("mradiff2"))

  if (!check) {
    comb <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "gdmtdiff_cat2", medvaradj = c("sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_mra1"), nomeddiff = c("bbldiff2", "rasiarnidiff2", "mradiff2", "loopdiff2"))
    comb_sens <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars,
      medvar = "gdmtdiff_cat2_inc",
      medvaradj = c("sos_lm_bbl1", "sos_lm_rasiarni1", "sos_lm_mra1"), nomeddiff = c("bbldiff2", "rasiarnidiff2", "mradiff2", "loopdiff2")
    )
    bbl <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "bbldiff2", medvaradj = "sos_lm_bbl1", nomeddiff = c("bbldiff2"))
    loop <- medfunc_inner(data, impdata, novars, medvar = "loopdiff2", medvaradj = "sos_lm_loop1", nomeddiff = c("loopdiff2"), val = "Decrease")
    tabgdmt <- bind_rows(comb, comb_sens, bbl, rasiarni, rasiarni_exarni, mra, loop)
  } else {
    tabgdmt <- bind_rows(rasiarni, rasiarni_exarni, mra)
  }

  tabgdmt <- tabgdmt %>%
    mutate(
      Med = str_remove_all(Med, "diff_cat2|diff2"),
      Med = factor(Med,
        levels = c("gdmt", "gdmt_inc", "bbl", "rasiarni", "rasiarni_exarni", "mra", "loop"),
        labels = c("Combined", "Combined - sensitivity", "Beta-blocker", "ACEi/ARB/ARNi", "ACEi/ARB", "MRA", "Loop diuretic")
      )
    )

  cn <- c("Medication", "Crude", "Adjusted baseline medication", "Adjusted baseline", "Adjusted baseline + change in medications")

  # excel
  make_one_xlsxsheet(tabgdmt, colnames = cn)

  cn <- sanitize_text(cn)

  default_kable(tabgdmt,
    escape = FALSE,
    col.names = cn
  ) %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "Odds Ratio (95% CI), p-value" = 4))
}
```
